remarks: A lattice line under a lattice plane is covered by it.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lplncvrlvol2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol2.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol2.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol2.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
lplncvrlvol2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. P /\ Y e. V ) /\ X .<_ Y ) -> X C Y ) $.
